name: Drone Assassin Strike PRO 2017 - Full Version
name_original: Drone Assassin Strike PRO 2017 - Full Version
description:
** THIS VERSION HAS NO IN GAME ADS **

Get ready to become an elite drone pilot in this realistic thrilling 3D action game.

Assess your target, avoid enemy fire and drop a Hellfire missile on the unsuspecting target. Switch camera modes to FPV spy view. Do you have what it takes to complete every mission and become an elite pilot?

Features:
- Many thrilling missions
- High quality 3D graphics
- Different drone models to unlock
